header.author: Joseph Browne
header.title: Antidotaria; or, a Collection of Antidotes against the PLAGUE, and other Malignant Diseases. Together, with some Decent and Useful Remarks, on the late Pharmacopoeia Londinensis, in a Letter to the President and College of PHYSICIANS; shewing the Necessity of a farther Reformation of their new London Dispensatory.
